projects.title: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: A content-based recommendation engine using cosine similarity to suggest movies based on user preferences and feature similarity.

projects.title: Diabetes Prediction System
projects.description: An AI-powered system that predicts the likelihood of diabetes using patient health metrics, featuring a clean web interface and real-time prediction.

projects.title: Car Price Prediction System
projects.description: A machine learning-based web application that predicts car prices using regression models trained on real-world datasets. Provides an interactive UI for instant predictions.

projects.title: Gold Price Prediction System
projects.description: Machine learning model that forecasts gold prices using historical financial data with an interactive Streamlit dashboard.

projects.title: Caesar Cipher Encryption App
projects.description: A cryptography-based web application that encrypts and decrypts messages using Caesar Cipher logic with a user-friendly interface.
